author: fwyzard
body:
#### PR description:

This PR adds new packages to test the implementation and usage of ROCm libraries for device code in CMSSW plugins and executables.

The package `HeterogeneousCore/ROCmTestDevice` implements a library that defines and exports ROCm device-only functions, and a plugin and test that use them.

The package `HeterogeneousCore/ROCmTestKernel` implements a library that imports device functions from `HeterogeneousCore/ROCmTestDevice` to define and export ROCm kernels, and a plugin and test that use them.

The package `HeterogeneousCore/ROCmTestWrapper` implements a library that imports kernels from `HeterogeneousCore/ROCmTestKernel` to define and export host-only wrappers around them, usable by non-ROCm libraries, plugins and applications, and implements a plugin and test that use them.

The package `HeterogeneousCore/ROCmTestHidden` implements a library that imports kernels from `HeterogeneousCore/ROCmTestKernel` to define and export host-only wrappers around the whole ROCm section, usable by libraries, plugins and applications that are not ROCm-aware, and implements a plugin and test that use them.

**The PR is not suitable for beinf merged in its current status (_e.g._ the final implementation requires a working `ROCmService`) but it is already useful for building the tests.**

#### PR validation:

This PR includes new unit tests for the validation of the various build rules.
Eventually, they should all pass.
title: Add a test for ROCm libraries and build rules
